entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 02:31 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 02:31 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 02:31 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
